reviewText: I'm absolutely thrilled with the quality of vegetables I received! The organic carrots were incredibly sweet and crunchy. Will definitely order again!
The fresh broccoli was excellent, arrived in perfect condition. Just wish there were more variety in the organic section.
I'm impressed by the freshness of the baby spinach. It lasted much longer than store-bought and tasted amazing in my salads!
The red bell peppers were good, but a couple were slightly bruised upon arrival. Hoping for better packaging next time.
The cherry tomatoes were bursting with flavor! So much better than what I usually find at the supermarket. Will be a repeat customer for sure!
Great selection of vegetables overall. The cucumber was especially crisp and refreshing. Just a small suggestion: it would be nice to have some tips on storage for maximum freshness.
